  • Constructor Details

    • Asset

      public Asset(String name, int amount, String description, ImageIcon icon)
      Super constructor for asset types
      Parameters:
      name - name of the asset
      amount - amount of available assets of this type
      description - description of the asset
      icon - of the asset
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - amount must not be negative

    • updateTextAreaText

      public void updateTextAreaText()
      Sets myTextArea text depending on current variables. Then calls UiManager to redraw the assetPanel.
      See Also:
      • UiObjectFactory.assetPanel

    • tryToUse

      public void tryToUse()
      safely tries to use asset

      this method checks if a valid coordinate is selected and asset has uses left. If not, shows a proper dialogue to the user and returns. If valid, calls reduceAmountByOne() and action() depending on the type of the asset.

      See Also:
      • reduceAmountByOne()
      • Sonar.action()
      • Vehicle.action()

    • tryToPreview

      public void tryToPreview()
      safely tries to preview the assets area of action

      this method checks if a valid coordiante is selected. if not, shows a dialogue to the user and returns. If valid, calls showPreview() depending on the type of the asset.

      See Also:
      • Vehicle.showPreview()
      • Sonar.showPreview()

    • deepCopy

      public abstract Asset deepCopy()
